text: Levon Aram Altounian (; ; 15 February 1936 â€“ 6 September 2020) was a Lebanese footballer. He played as a winger or midfielder. He was born in Beirut. Altounian played his whole club career at Homenetmen between 1952 and 1973. He also played for the national team from 1954 to 1963. On 6 September 2020, Altounian died at a hospital in Roumieh, Lebanon at the age of 84. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2020 deaths Category:People from Beirut Category:Lebanese footballers
title: Levon Altounian
